publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-380 Bill Kidd: Federation of Master Builders—That the Parliament congratulates the Federation of Master Builders (FMB) for its Beware the Summer Doorknockers campaign, providing useful information on how to avoid rogue builders; welcomes the FMB’s recognition of the specific problems faced by elderly and disabled people and other vulnerable groups, and further welcomes any such attempt to make it harder for criminal elements to exist in the construction industry.
S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Rob Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*

S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Bill Wilson*, Elaine Smith*, Angela Constance*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*, Hugh Henry*, Gil Paterson*, Nigel Don*, Sandra White*, Alex Neil*, Pauline McNeill*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Brian Adam*, Bashir Ahmad*, Karen Gillon*, Cathy Peattie*
S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Robert Brown*
S3M-380 Federation of Master Builders (lodged on 23 August 2007) Dave Thompson*

S3M-380*#* Bill Kidd: Federation of Master Builders—That the Parliament congratulates the Federation of Master Builders (FMB) for its Beware the Summer Doorknockers campaign, providing useful information on how to avoid rogue builders; welcomes the FMB’s recognition of the specific problems faced by elderly and disabled people and other vulnerable groups, and further welcomes any such attempt to make it harder for criminal elements to exist in the construction industry. Supported by: George Foulkes* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
